category: Regulations for overseas Korean sports organizations/Article 3 (Requirements for designation of overseas Korean sports organizations)
contents: Article 3 (Requirements for designation as an overseas Korean sports organization) ① An organization wishing to be designated as an overseas Korean sports organization by the Sports Council must meet all of the following requirements. 1. The need to establish an overseas Korean sports organization in the relevant country must be recognized. 2. The organization must be recommended by the head of an overseas diplomatic mission in the relevant country. 3. There must be five or more member sports organizations or branches (local sports associations) established. 4. It must be an organization that has been established for at least one year. ② Even if the requirements of paragraph 1 are met, the Sports Council must fully recognize the need to designate it as an overseas Korean sports organization.
